title: What I don't like about Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
body:
Leonardo and Raphael were never able to use their weapons because they were edged/sharp. 

When you watch the old movies from the 90s, Michaelangelo and Donatello could hit the Foot Soldiers with their weapons because they're blunted. Leo has swords which are for slashing and piercing and Raphael has Sais which are stabbing and piercing. Obviously for a kids' movie they couldn't have the heroes stabbing and chopping peoples' heads off. 

Also in the 2nd movie they didn't fight Super Shredder. Super Shredder collapsed the pier he was under and got crushed, even though in the 1st movie normal Shredder survived getting crushed by a trash compactor. 

Also the 3rd movie was bad.
